svg.aria-label: BC Government AI research height and depth model

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: BC GOV AI RESEARCH: HEIGHT AND DEPTH

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: Visible outcomes above water, technical grounding below water

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: Height (visible impact):

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: service copilots

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: agentic workflows

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: content automation

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: faster delivery

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: Depth keeps these outcomes reliable, safe, and cost-aware.

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: DEPTH AND GROUNDING INCREASES

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: 1. Applications and Agentic Systems

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: Service workflow orchestration, tool use reliability, deployment patterns.

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: Fast-moving layer: visible outcomes, frequent iteration.

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: 2. Safe AI and Red Teaming

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: Threat modeling, prompt attack testing, eval benchmarks, governance checks.

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: Control layer: prevents fragile systems from scaling unsafely.

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: 3. Learning AI Internals

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: Attention behavior, token flow, inference characteristics, memory constraints.

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: Understanding layer: explains why systems succeed or fail.

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: 4. Compute and Systems

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: CPU/GPU fit, runtime optimization, throughput, latency, and cost profiling.

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: Stability layer: durable technical constraints that shape all design choices.

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: 5. Enabling AI Across BC Gov

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: Reusable playbooks, implementation standards, and adoption guidance for diverse applications.

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: Bedrock: grounded research translated into policy and delivery practice.

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: HEIGHT

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: DEPTH

text.font-family: BC Sans, Noto Sans, Segoe UI, Arial

svg.text: Build high, but stay grounded: every public-sector AI outcome should rest on measurable technical depth.
